articles.title: High-frequency waves detected in the Martian Upper Atmosphere could help understand plasma processes over Mars - Department Of Science & Technology
articles.description: The Department of Science & Technology plays a pivotal role in promotion of science & technology in the country.
articles.content: Scientists have detected existence of high-frequency plasma waves in the Martian Upper Atmosphere with novel narrowband and broadband features that can help to understand plasma processes in the Mart… [+3052 chars]
